import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { FaFlask, FaChartLine, FaUsers, FaShieldAlt, FaFileAlt, FaBell } from 'react-icons/fa'; const LandingPage = () => { return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Lab Experiment Logbook

Streamline your laboratory research with our comprehensive digital logbook. Track experiments, manage data, and collaborate with your team seamlessly.

{/* Features Section */}

Why Choose Our Lab Logbook?

Everything you need to manage your laboratory experiments efficiently

Digital Documentation Create, edit, and organize your experiment records digitally. No more paper notebooks or lost data.
Progress Tracking Monitor experiment status, track progress, and visualize your research timeline with ease.
Team Collaboration Share experiments with your team, collaborate on research, and maintain transparency across projects.
Secure & Reliable Your research data is protected with enterprise-grade security and regular backups.
Experiment Management Organize experiments by status, date, or custom categories. Find what you need instantly.
Smart Notifications Get notified about experiment updates, deadlines, and important milestones automatically.
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Transform Your Lab Work?

Join thousands of researchers who trust our platform for their laboratory management needs.

{/* Footer */}

© 2024 Lab Experiment Logbook. All rights reserved.
); }; export default LandingPage;
